title: Protests, Fires Follow Announcement Of Ferguson Grand Jury's Decision
teaser: A grand jury did not indict Ferguson, Mo., police officer Darren Wilson for any crimes related to the death of 18-year-old Michael Brown in August. Public reaction was both swift and mixed, with reports of police using smoke to disperse crowds in some areas, while in others, protesters marched peacefully
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
